name: Check user input and construct payload object
To SNMP (view result in debug window)
CREATE Tables
func:
msg.topic = "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS steamUser (steamId INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, scumName TEXT, ipAddress TEXT, scumId NUMERIC);";
return msg;

name: Check user input and construct payload object
To SNMP (view result in debug window)
Format message - chat
Create Login Object
Check if New Steam User
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM steamUser WHERE steamId = " + msg.player.steamid
return msg;

name: Create New Steam User
func:
msg.topic = "INSERT INTO steamUser(steamId, scumName, ipAddress, scumId) values(" + msg.player.steamid + ", '" + msg.player.scumname +"', '" + msg.player.ip + "', " + msg.player.scumid + ")";
return msg;

name: Create Logout Object
Fetch Steam User Logging Out
func:
msg.topic = "SELECT * FROM steamUser WHERE scumId = " + msg.player.scumid;
return msg;
